blocks.command: tag @a[scores={shotFirework=1..},nbt={SelectedItem:{id:"minecraft:warped_fungus_on_a_stick",Count:1b,tag:{fireworkShooter:1b}}}] add shotFirework
scoreboard players reset @a[scores={shotFirework=1..}] shotFirework
execute as @a[tag=shotFirework] at @s anchored eyes run summon minecraft:firework_rocket ~ ~1.6 ~ {ShotAtAngle:1b,Motion:[0.0,0.0,0.0],Tags:["superRocket","sfFirework"],LifeTime:60,Rotation:[0,0]}

execute as @a[tag=shotFirework] at @s anchored eyes run summon firework_rocket ~ ~1.6 ~ {LifeTime:60,ShotAtAngle:1b,Motion:[0.0,0.0,0.0],Tags:["superRocket","sfFirework"],Passengers:[{id:"minecraft:armor_stand",Invulnerable:1b,Small:1b,Invisible:1b,Tags:["fwBackupStand"]}]}
execute as @e[tag=sfmFireworkNew] at @s run tp @p[tag=shotFirework]\
execute as @a[tag=shotFirework] at @s run summon marker ~ ~ ~ {Tags:["sfmFirework","sfmFireworkNew"]}
execute as @e[tag=sfmFireworkNew] at @s run tp @p[tag=shotFirework]
execute as @e[tag=sfmFireworkNew] at @s run tp ~ ~1.6 ~
execute if entity @a[tag=shotFirework] run setblock -14 -60 -2 minecraft:redstone_block\
tag @e remove shotFirework
tag @e remove sfmFireworkNew
execute as @e[tag=sfmFirework] at @s run tp ^ ^ ^1
execute as @e[tag=sfFirework] at @s facing entity @e[tag=sfmFirework,sort=nearest,limit=1] eyes run tp @s ~ ~ ~ ~ ~
execute as @e[tag=sfmFirework] at @s run tp ^ ^ ^-1
execute as @e[tag=sfFirework] store result score @s shootFacingFWX run data get entity @s Pos[0] 1000
execute as @e[tag=sfFirework] store result score @s shootFacingFWY run data get entity @s Pos[1] 1000
execute as @e[tag=sfFirework] store result score @s shootFacingFWZ run data get entity @s Pos[2] 1000
execute as @e[tag=sfmFirework] at @s run tp ^ ^ ^-1
execute as @e[tag=sfmFirework] store result score @s shootFacingFWX run data get entity @s Pos[0] 1000
execute as @e[tag=sfmFirework] store result score @s shootFacingFWY run data get entity @s Pos[1] 1000
execute as @e[tag=sfmFirework] store result score @s shootFacingFWZ run data get entity @s Pos[2] 1000
execute as @e[tag=sfmFirework] at @s run tp ^ ^ ^1
execute as @e[tag=sfFirework] run scoreboard players operation @s shootFacingFWX -= @e[tag=sfmFirework,sort=nearest,limit=1] shootFacingFWX
execute as @e[tag=sfFirework] run scoreboard players operation @s shootFacingFWY -= @e[tag=sfmFirework,sort=nearest,limit=1] shootFacingFWY
execute as @e[tag=sfFirework] run scoreboard players operation @s shootFacingFWZ -= @e[tag=sfmFirework,sort=nearest,limit=1] shootFacingFWZ
execute as @e[tag=sfFirework] store result entity @s Motion[0] double .001 run scoreboard players get @s shootFacingFWX
execute as @e[tag=sfFirework] store result entity @s Motion[1] double .001 run scoreboard players get @s shootFacingFWY
execute as @e[tag=sfFirework] store result entity @s Motion[2] double .001 run scoreboard players get @s shootFacingFWZ
tag @e remove sfFirework
kill @e[tag=sfmFirework]
execute as @e[tag=superRocket] at @s if block ~ ~.4 ~ air if block ~ ~-.4 ~ air if block ~.4 ~ ~ air if block ~-.4 ~ ~ air if block ~ ~ ~.4 air if block ~ ~ ~-.4 air run tag @s add notExplodeFirework
execute as @e[tag=fwBackupStand] at @s unless entity @e[tag=superRocket,distance=..1] run tag @s add superRocket

execute as @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework] at @s as @a[distance=..3] at @s facing entity @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework,limit=1] feet rotated ~ 0 positioned ~ ~1.5 ~ run summon creeper ^ ^ ^.2 {ignited:1b, Fuse:0s, Invulnerable:1b, ExplosionRadius:1b}

execute as @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework] at @s as @a[distance=..3] at @s facing entity @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework,limit=1] feet rotated ~ 0 positioned ~ ~1.5 ~ run summon creeper ^ ^ ^.2 {ignited:1b, Fuse:0s, Invulnerable:1b, ExplosionRadius:1b}

execute as @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework] at @s as @a[distance=..3] at @s facing entity @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework,limit=1] feet rotated ~ 0 positioned ~ ~1.5 ~ run summon creeper ^ ^ ^.2 {ignited:1b, Fuse:0s, Invulnerable:1b, ExplosionRadius:1b}

execute as @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework] at @s as @a[distance=..3] at @s facing entity @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework,limit=1] feet rotated ~ 0 positioned ~ ~1.5 ~ run summon creeper ^ ^ ^.2 {ignited:1b, Fuse:0s, Invulnerable:1b, ExplosionRadius:1b}
execute as @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework] at @s run summon creeper ~ ~ ~ {ignited:1b, Fuse:0s, Invulnerable:1b, ExplosionRadius:1b}
execute as @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework] at @s run fill ~.5 ~.5 ~.5 ~-.5 ~-.5 ~-.5 air replace #minecraft:mineable/shovel
execute as @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework] at @s run fill ~.5 ~.5 ~.5 ~-.5 ~-.5 ~-.5 air replace #minecraft:mineable/hoe
execute as @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework] at @s run fill ~.5 ~.5 ~.5 ~-.5 ~-.5 ~-.5 air replace #minecraft:mineable/axe
execute as @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework] at @s run fill ~.5 ~.5 ~.5 ~-.5 ~-.5 ~-.5 air replace #minecraft:mineable/pickaxe
execute as @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework] at @s run kill @e[tag=fwBackupStand,limit=1,sort=nearest,distance=..1]
execute as @e[tag=superRocket,tag=!notExplodeFirework] at @s run kill
tag @e remove notExplodeFirework
tag @e remove notExplodeFirework
scoreboard objectives add shootFacingFWX dummy
scoreboard objectives add shootFacingFWY dummy
scoreboard objectives add shootFacingFWZ dummy
scoreboard objectives add shotFirework minecraft.used:minecraft.warped_fungus_on_a_stick
